The original contract by which Milton signed away his interest in one of the most famous poems ever penned, is to be seen 111 1116 British Museum 111 London‚ and, as may well be imagined, is an object of great curiosity. If the fame of this production‚ 111 which the dazzling genius displayed is undisputed, could have been foreseen, it would have brought a fortune to its author instead of the paltry sum for which the copyright was sold—another instance, of which many are on record, of the under- value placed upon literary works and the impossibility of guessing whether they are destined to great success or doomed to pitiable failure.
